cause.description:
Michael Wang's challenge is to gain 25kg and then ride to work on a pogo stick.
Michael is then to loose 25kg of weight within 6months.
Any funds raised for this venture will go to the Mater Childrens Hospital.
1. pmison@atdw.com.au
2. mau@atdw.com.au
3. kbo@atdw.com.au
cause.name: Michael Wang Mankini
